title: Strategic Collaborations
intro: Our MoUs unlock capstone briefs, skill accelerators, and community projects so every learner experiences industry on day one.

sections.heading: Why partnerships matter
sections.body: Each collaboration adds labs, mentors, and certification journeys that align coursework with real hiring needs across software, design, and social impact.

sections.heading: How we activate MoUs
sections.body: From joint workshops to co-created curriculum modules, partners stay embedded through semester-long projects and placement pipelines.

tabs.label: MoU Partners
tabs.heading: Partnership dossiers
tabs.description: Download each memorandum to review the scope of work, certification benefits, and student programs.

cards.title: IBM
cards.body: IBM mentors host design-thinking clinics, enterprise hackathons, and cloud upskilling via the Skills Academy platform.

cards.title: CAD Skills Solutions
cards.body: Advanced CAD/CAM labs plus certification attempts that sharpen manufacturing design portfolios.

cards.title: Employment News Rojgar Samachar
cards.body: Career-readiness bootcamps and public-sector placement drives with live vacancy briefings.

cards.title: Ensino Research & Development
cards.body: Joint research mandates and product prototyping sprints for interdisciplinary teams.

cards.title: Naya Savera Society
cards.body: Community innovation labs tackling rural development and sustainability use cases.

cards.title: PrimeCAD Training Institute
cards.body: Industry-grade CAD/CAE masterclasses with portfolio-ready assignments and dual-delivery formats.

cards.title: Slog Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
cards.body: IoT, cloud, and full-stack deployment briefs that culminate in internship and placement opportunities.

metadata.title: Strategic Collaborations | Shivalik College
metadata.description: Explore the MoUs and industry alliances powering IBM labs, CAD certifications, community projects, and placement pipelines at Shivalik College.
